subject: Sports Injuries
Football
Paralysis
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The paralyzed Rutgers player Eric LeGrand has been taken off a ventilator and is able to breathe on his own, the university said.
snippet: The paralyzed Rutgers player Eric LeGrand has been taken off a ventilator and is able to breathe on his own, the university said.
